segments.text: Good morning , sir . May I see your passport ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , of course . Here it is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . Are all these yours ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , some of them are my friend's . Do you want her passport , too ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , please . Do you have any carry-on items ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you want me to put it on the belt , too ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , please . Would you please open this big suitcase ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . Just a moment . It's just some clothes and toiletries .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Do you have anything to declare ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Any fresh food , live plants , or animals ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . You may lock up your suitcase . Here are your passports .
segments.speaker: S1
